law.full_text:
RECORDS.
It shall be the duty of every person required to pay the tax imposed by this article to keep and preserve for a period of four (4) years all records as may be necessary to determine the amount of such tax as such person may have been liable to pay to the City, which records the Director of Finance shall have the right to inspect at all reasonable times.

unit.catch_line: Additional Powers And Duties Of Director Of Finance.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
RECORDS. (§ 21.2.9)
RECORDS. It shall be the duty of every person required to pay the tax imposed by this article to keep and preserve for a period of four (4) years all records as may be necessary to determine the amount of such tax as such person may have been liable to pay to the City, which records the Director of Finance shall have the right to inspect at all reasonable times.

RECORDS.

It shall be the duty of every person required to pay the tax imposed by this article to keep and preserve for a period of four (4) years all records as may be necessary to determine the amount of such tax as such person may have been liable to pay to the City, which records the Director of Finance shall have the right to inspect at all reasonable times.
